title: Proofpoint TAP - Messages Insights
description: This dashboard provides insights into email threats by showing messages that were either blocked or delivered.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides insights into email threats by showing messages that were either blocked or delivered.

For more information, see the [Proofpoint TAP Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/proofpoint_tap/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
